How many people are affected by glycogen storage disease type V ?,"GSDV is a rare disorder; however, its prevalence is unknown. In the Dallas-Fort Worth area of Texas, where the prevalence of GSDV has been studied, the condition is estimated to affect 1 in 100,000 individuals.",GHR,glycogen storage disease type V
What are the genetic changes related to glycogen storage disease type V ?,"Mutations in the PYGM gene c
